features: One Finishing Touch Flawless Facial Hair Remover, Rose Gold stainless steel blade hair remover device for women features 18 karat gold plating and LED light for precision
Use the facial hair trimmer to instantly remove peach fuzz and hair from lips, chin, neck and cheeks or use as an eyebrow shaper to maintain flawless brows between, or instead of, waxing and plucking

Hypoallergenic and dermatologist recommended, this electric face razor allows anyone to painlessly remove unwanted hair by simply pressing to the face and making small circular motions, leaving skin smooth and hair-free

Made with 18 karat gold and shaped like a tube of lipstick for discreet hair removal anywhere, this womens electric razor utilizes revolutionary Butterfly Technology that removes hair by microscopically paring it down by a spinning head covered by a plate
Flawless facial hair removal device is gentle enough to use every day before putting on makeup, no need to wait for regrowth, so you can enjoy hairless skin every day without nicks, bumps or cuts
body.description: Finishing Touch Flawless Facial Hair Remover for Women is the revolutionary facial hair removal device that erases hair easily, effectively and painlessly. Enjoy smooth, hairless skin without the redness, irritation or nicks, cuts or bumps that come with shaving. Made with an easy-to-hold design, this womens’ electric razor is ideal for removing peach fuzz, middle brows, cheek, chin and upper lip hair, or used as an eyebrow trimmer. The Flawless face hair trimmer is dermatologist recommended, hypoallergenic and helps makeup apply more smoothly and skin care products to absorb faster. To use, insert the included AA battery, remove the cap and slide the switch of the electric face razor to on. Gently press the hair removal device flat against your skin and make small, circular movements. Revolutionary Butterfly Technology with over 60% more blades than previous versions of Finishing Touch Flawless Facial Hair Remover removes unwanted hair under an 18 karat gold-plated head, never touching delicate facial skin. This facial hair remover is designed to look like a tube of lipstick and is fitted with an LED light, so you can bring it anywhere you go for discreet and precise hair removal anytime. Always be Flawless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made & Designed Facial Hair Remover Perfect for Elderly
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my elderly mom with dementia. She used to shave her facial hair with a disposable razor but no longer remembers to do it so I was looking for something I could use to do it for her that was a little safer for me to handle on her delicate skin. This little tool is perfect. It appears well built like it will last and only uses one battery which is surprisingly included at this price point. The feminine pink/grey color is attractive and it is just the right size to fit in my hand, not too big, not too small. It is quiet and simple to operate, easy to change battery, all pieces fit together snugly. The ring light helps me see light colored/gray hairs. Easy to clean/maintain, just twist off the top & blow or brush out hairs. I think there are replaceable heads that can be purchased for it though I have not looked into those yet. I have only had it a few days but we are very pleased with it so far. It appears to be made to last and with only a single battery vs the amount of power it uses, I would be very surprised if the battery life were short so I gave it the 5 stars on that. Shipping was fast, packaging was good, and price very reasonable - overall a good value that I would recommend to family/friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Facial Hair Remover!
reviews.reviewText: Great price for this facial hair remover! It's totally painless and does a fantastic job! Much easier and less expensive than waxing or threading. I'd highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Remove facial hair easily
reviews.reviewText: It works. Doesn’t irritate your face. It’s size helps localize where removal is necessary

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not ouchy. Study. Does the job.
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these at lower price from a discount store but didn't like it. It didn't work well and pulled on hairs. Different brand.This works well. Has light and doesn't hurt. I can tell the difference in quality. Worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This newer version ROCKS!
reviews.reviewText: Works better than the original for some reason. No irritation if you’ve never tried this. Easy, quick , pain-free hair removal!! A Godsend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this to remove peach fuzz from my face. I used to have another brand which worked great, but finally gave out after several years of use. Apparently that brand is no longer available except on ebay, so I ordered another brand from Amazon. It worked for about 3 times, and stopped working. Then I ordered this one, and so far it's been working fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: This is my second one of these. The one I had previously was not updated like this one. I like the new light on this one a lot. You can see much butter. It works quickly, gently and effectively to remove any facial hair I want to get rid of. I really like to remove the peach fuzz on my cheeks, and I have a slight mustache (it's pretty invisible, but I know it's there and it makes me self-conscious). For any of you that wonder, the peach fuzz, etc does NOT grow in any differently. Not thicker, not darker, just the same. My old model just kind of got weak gradually. I kept thinking I needed a new battery, but that didn't help. It lasted 2 or three years, and for the price I think that's fine. I anticipate this one to last at least as long. I really recommend this, I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that this hair remover works. It is quick, a little noisier than my previous one but not noisy enough to be an issue. The ring light is a slightly better than the light on my previous hair remover but neither light is very good and pretty much useless. I haven't used this product long enough to know the battery life. Over all I am happy with my purchase.
